divs: Sighting DetailsFor well over a year I have been seeing red & green flashing lights on what at 1st appeared to be stars. Numerous ones every night. Also chem trails have become a VERY regular event in Ohio. I haven't seen any other reports in Ohio on this, I can't be the only one seeing this!
Summary: green & red lights at night for over a year. Chemtrails almost daily
